title: 这是什么情况
author: 吴克
txt_content:
Mods loaded: 1
ModLoader 1.2.5

      Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      

Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 274cdf2f --------
Generated 12-9-3 下午8:51

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
[failed to get system properties (java.lang.NullPointerException)]

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:185)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:311)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:856)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:784)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:765)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:236)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:657)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 78099d4d ----------

replies.author: 小影
replies.txt_content: 楼主你可以进登录器的时候，点设置，把论坛改成512。如果不行的话，你就看看JAVA路径对了没有。。~

吴克 发表于 2012-9-3 20:53 
穷人没钱，钱被坑玩了
楼主的是集显吧，把硬件加速调至左边第三个格子
找不到合适的答案可以申请关闭帖子拿回金币的= =

replies.author: mingl0280
replies.txt_content: 右键点击桌面－属性－高级－疑难解答－硬件加速－把那个滑块拉到从左至右第三个位置即可。（没分就干脆关闭了吧，谁坑了你钱就去公告与反馈区发帖申诉。）
